com.netflix.nicobar.core.compile

Interface ScriptArchiveCompiler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BytecodeLoader, Groovy2Compiler, NoOpCompiler

    public interface ScriptArchiveCompiler
    Converts a Script Archive into a Set of classes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> compile(ScriptArchive archive, JBossModuleClassLoader moduleClassLoader, java.nio.file.Path targetDir)
      Compile the archive into a ScriptModule
      boolean shouldCompile(ScriptArchive archive)
      Whether or not this compiler should be used to compile the archive

    • Method Detail

      • shouldCompile

        boolean shouldCompile(ScriptArchive archive)
        Whether or not this compiler should be used to compile the archive

      • compile

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> compile(ScriptArchive archive,
                                        JBossModuleClassLoader moduleClassLoader,
                                        java.nio.file.Path targetDir)
                                          throws ScriptCompilationException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        Compile the archive into a ScriptModule
        Parameters:
        archive - archive to generate class files for
        moduleClassLoader - class loader which can be used to find all classes and resources for modules. The resultant classes of the compile operation should be injected into the classloader for which the given archive has a declared dependency on
        targetDir - a directory in which to store compiled classes, if any.
        Returns:
        The set of classes that were compiled
        Throws:
        ScriptCompilationException - if there was a compilation issue in the archive.
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem reading/writing the archive
